How reproducible: 100%

Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:
This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 25 development cycle. Changing version to '25'.

Come on! http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/purple-telegram.git/tree/?h=f25 not fixed in F25 http://pkgs.fedoraproject.org/cgit/rpms/purple-telegram.git/tree/ not fixed in Rawhide

Sorry, it's all done by Bodhi automatically. I just accidentally marked the bug as solved when I made a new release. I hope all the automatic closings are over now. I'm currently in the last phase of LibreOffice Conference organization, so I don't have time even for easy fixes. Once it's over, I'll look into this and fix it.
